name: CO-OP TD
description:
Maze towers to achieve victory!

Left click to place towers on the field.

Right click to clear current selection.

Tower Choices:

  • Pea Tower: Basic tower with seeking projectiles
  • Soil Tower: Cheap tower used for mazing
  • Watermelon Tower: Fast shooting tower
  • Coconut Tree Tower: Splash damage
  • Hose Tower: Splash + slow

The name is based on a co-op farms and was meant to be a online multiplayer co-op experience. However there was only enough time to get co-op working on the same IP, which is pretty impractical so it was scrapped last minute out of this project.
